data.title: East Central University
data.meta_description: Located in Ada, Oklahoma, East Central University (ECU) is recognized as Oklahoma's premier comprehensive student-centered regional university, offering outstanding academic programs and experiences for its students and contributing to the betterment of the region and beyond.
